1.title: Message of the Day
1.body: One message, and once each day. Take note, because they don't repeat!

2.title: Revision History and Entity file Integration
2.body:
Add the directives:

#_DSD:REVISION HISTORY = XX
#_DSD:ENTITY FILE= XX

to your content spec to get custom Revision History topic and Entity file topic integration

3.title: Automated Revision History
3.body: Once you incorporate your Revision History, use the 'Update Revision History' button (in the book) to get your major commit messages rolled up to a revhistory entry

4.title: Change topic titles in the editor
4.body: Just change the xml <title> element in the editor

5.title: Drag and Drop image upload
5.body: Drop .png images into the editor to have them upload and insert at the current cursor location

6.title: Fixed Rev topic tracking
6.body: Fixed Revision topics notify you when they are changed upstream
